fasttravel.macfarlanes.name: 맥팔레인 목장
fasttravel.manzanita.name: 만자니타 교역소
fasttravel.blackwater.name: 블랙워터
fasttravel.strawberry.name: 스트로베리
fasttravel.valentine.name: 발렌타인
fasttravel.colter.name: 콜터
fasttravel.emerald.name: 에메랄드 역
fasttravel.rhodes.name: 로도스
fasttravel.wapiti.name: 와피티
fasttravel.van_horn.name: 반 혼
fasttravel.annesburg.name: 앤즈버그
fasttravel.saint_denis.name: 생 드니
fasttravel.lagras.name: 라그라스
cups_ace.name: 성배 에이스
cups_ace_2.desc: 작은 창고 뒤에 있는 드럼통 위.
cups_ace_3.desc: 오른쪽 침실의 침대 옆 탁자 위.
cups_two.name: 성배 2
cups_two_1.desc: On a barrel under the building.
cups_two_2.desc: On a crate on the lower deck of the railway bridge.
cups_three.name: 성배 3
cups_four.name: 성배 4
cups_four_1.desc: On top of fireplace inside building.
cups_five.name: 성배 5
cups_five_1.desc: On a table next to a scale.
cups_five_3.desc: On top of the theatre facing Blackwater Restaurant and Althewate Inn.
cups_six.name: 성배 6
cups_six_2.desc: On the back of the wagon.
cups_seven.name: 성배 7
cups_seven_1.desc: On a barrel outside of the shed.
cups_seven_2.desc: Inside the bedroom on the nightstand behind the door.
cups_seven_3.desc: Inside the house in a open cupboard.
cups_eight.name: 성배 8
cups_eight_1.desc: On a barrel underneath an awning.
cups_eight_2.desc: On the right most shelf at the shootingrange.
cups_nine.name: 성배 9
cups_nine_3.desc: On shelf right side of entrance.
cups_ten.name: 성배 10
cups_ten_1.desc: on table beside bucket of water.
cups_ten_3.desc: Inside the barn on the back right side
cups_knight.name: 성배의 기사
cups_knight_2.desc: On a table underneath the awning in the back. of wands
cups_knight_3.desc: On a crate under the awnining of the barn.
cups_page.name: 성배의 시종
cups_page_1.desc: On the window sill in the north western room.
cups_page_3.desc: On the table near the water tubs.
cups_queen.name: 성배의 여왕
cups_queen_1.desc: On top of the first nightstand to the right.
cups_queen_2.desc: On top of barrel right side of dock.
cups_queen_3.desc: Inside the mine on a crate next to a lantern.
cups_king.name: 성배의 왕
cups_king_1.desc: On a table on the second floor. Walk up the stairs.
swords_ace.name: 검 에이스
swords_ace_1.desc: On top level of windmill. Climb the ladders.
swords_ace_2.desc: In the windowsil on the upper floor of the barn.
swords_two.name: 검 2
swords_two_1.desc: On the table on the front porch.
swords_two_2.desc: In The eastern broken down window.
swords_two_3.desc: On crates next to a wagon.
swords_three.name: 검 3
swords_three_1.desc: On a windowsil left of the house.
swords_three_2.desc: On top of the tower. Climb the ladders.
swords_three_3.desc: In the theatre tent on a chair in the front row.
swords_four.name: 검 4
swords_five.name: 검 5
swords_five_2.desc: On a bench under the front porch.
swords_five_3.desc: Behind the building on a crate.
swords_six.name: 검 6
swords_six_3.desc: on top of the windmill tower.
swords_seven.name: 검 7
swords_seven_1.desc: Next to a blue barrel on the south west dock.
swords_seven_2.desc: In the back of a wagon on a green crate.
swords_seven_3.desc: Underneath the awning on a bench. Watch for grizzly bear.
swords_eight.name: 검 8
swords_eight_1.desc: On a white table with a chess board.
swords_eight_2.desc: On a white table with a large ceramic bottle.
swords_nine.name: 검 9
swords_nine_1.desc: On the back of the haywagon.
swords_nine_2.desc: On top of the water tower. Need to climb ladder.
swords_ten.name: 검 10
swords_ten_1.desc: On a shelf above the coathooks directly to the right.
swords_ten_2.desc: Outside the house on some crates at the north east side.
swords_knight.name: 검의 기사
swords_page.name: 검의 시종
swords_page_1.desc: On the windowsil of the outhouse.
swords_page_2.desc: On the log bench with a lantern on it
swords_page_3.desc: Sitting on crates beside a pile of silver pipes.
swords_queen.name: 검의 여왕
swords_queen_1.desc: Inside building on shelf against south wall.
swords_king.name: 검의 왕
swords_king_1.desc: On the shelf behind the counter in Algernon Wasp's Shop.
swords_king_3.desc: Inside fenced in area on top of blue barrel.
wands_ace.name: 지팡이 에이스
wands_ace_1.desc: On top of piano in corner of room inside house on main floor
wands_ace_2.desc: Inside the house on the werstern table with a lot of bottles.
wands_two.name: 지팡이 2
wands_two_1.desc: On a bench on the patio of the house.
wands_two_2.desc: On a sidetable on the front porch.
wands_two_3.desc: On the side of the pier.
wands_three.name: 지팡이 3
wands_three_1.desc: Outside on the left side of the chimney.
wands_three_2.desc: In the back of the graveyard on "Samantha Worth's" grave
wands_four.name: 지팡이 4
wands_five.name: 지팡이 5
wands_five_2.desc: In the bookshelf in the kitchen.
wands_five_3.desc: On barrel right beside the fence.
wands_six.name: 지팡이 6
wands_six_2.desc: Inside building on shelf right of fireplace.
wands_six_3.desc: On a shelf in the back room.
wands_seven.name: 지팡이 7
wands_seven_2.desc: On the table on the front porch.
wands_seven_3.desc: on window sill of broken down building.
wands_eight.name: 지팡이 8
wands_eight_1.desc: On shelf against the south wall of saloon.
wands_eight_2.desc: On a barrel on the top floor of the barn.
wands_nine.name: 지팡이 9
wands_nine_1.desc: Get on shorter roof. Card is on window sill.
wands_nine_2.desc: Inside the mine on a barrel next to a lantern.
wands_nine_3.desc: On the railing of the dam near one of the weels.
wands_ten.name: 지팡이 10
wands_ten_1.desc: On the elevated platform in two trees.
wands_knight.name: 지팡이의 기사
wands_knight_1.desc: In the back of the hut on the right side of the counter.
wands_knight_2.desc: In mausoleum. Enterance only from the north.
wands_knight_3.desc: On the edge of the water basin.
wands_page.name: 지팡이의 시종
wands_page_2.desc: On the shelving unit next to the door.
wands_queen.name: 지팡이의 여왕
wands_queen_1.desc: On top of a barrel in the boat.
wands_queen_2.desc: Inside the house on a taxidermy table. need to climb into the top window.
wands_queen_3.desc: On top of flipped over dresser.
wands_king.name: 지팡이의 왕
wands_king_3.desc: ON the ship near the steering wheel.
pentacles_ace.name: 펜타클 에이스
pentacles_ace_2.desc: On a table next to a scale.
pentacles_two.name: 펜타클 2
pentacles_two_1.desc: In a coffin next to a mass grave.
pentacles_three.name: 펜타클 3
pentacles_three_1.desc: Behind the post office on the railing at the top of the stairs.
pentacles_three_2.desc: On the larger table in the back
pentacles_three_3.desc: Outside. Sitting on bench of broken down wagon.
pentacles_four.name: 펜타클 4
pentacles_four_1.desc: On top of the well cover. Watch out bears!
pentacles_five.name: 펜타클 5
pentacles_five_1.desc: Inside the house on the desk below the window.
pentacles_five_3.desc: In the windowsil with with barrels infront of it.
pentacles_six.name: 펜타클 6
pentacles_six_1.desc: In second floor of building on desk.
pentacles_six_2.desc: On the back of a wagon.
pentacles_six_3.desc: On a crate on the ground floor.
pentacles_seven.name: 펜타클 7
pentacles_seven_2.desc: In Alley. On top of two crates.
pentacles_eight.name: 펜타클 8
pentacles_eight_1.desc: Inside house on a window sill in a bedroom.
pentacles_nine.name: 펜타클 9
pentacles_nine_1.desc: Inside building on a shelf in the storeroom.
pentacles_nine_2.desc: Inside the house on a table.
pentacles_ten.name: 펜타클 10
pentacles_ten_1.desc: On window sill. Climb ladder to get to it.
pentacles_ten_2.desc: On a crate in the middle of the broken down house.
pentacles_knight.name: 펜타클의 기사
pentacles_knight_1.desc: On a crate sitting on the porch.
pentacles_knight_2.desc: On southern part of boat that is docked.
pentacles_knight_3.desc: In the basement on a barrel.
pentacles_page.name: 펜타클의 시종
pentacles_page_1.desc: On the table in the middle of the viking tomb.
pentacles_queen.name: 펜타클의 여왕
pentacles_queen_1.desc: In the jai on the bench between the two cells.
pentacles_queen_2.desc: Inside on a small table next to the entrance. Watchout Cougars!
pentacles_queen_3.desc: Inside burnt building on top of fire place.
pentacles_king.name: 펜타클의 왕
pentacles_king_1.desc: Inside building. On small yellow nightstand on the right as you enter.
pentacles_king_2.desc: On the barrel next to the outhouse.
coin_gold_quarter.name: 1800년 골드 쿼터
coin_gold_quarter_1.desc: At the base of a tree next to a puddle.
coin_gold_quarter_2.desc: Inbetween a rock and a fallen tree.
coin_draped_bust_silver_dollar.name: 1798년 드레이프 버스트 실버 달러
coin_draped_bust_silver_dollar_1.desc: On the shoreline next to the beaver burrow.
coin_draped_bust_silver_dollar_2.desc: Behind a rock surrounded by cacti.
coin_draped_bust_silver_dollar_3.desc: On the island by the tree stump.
coin_one_cent_token.name: 1787년 1센트 토큰
coin_one_cent_token_2.desc: Near the crates next to the tree.
coin_one_cent_token_3.desc: At the edge of the cliff, follow the natural path downward from the top of the cliff.
coin_silver_dollar.name: 1794년 실버 달러
coin_silver_dollar_3.desc: Inside the mine at the end of the tunnel.
coin_new_yorke_token.name: 1700년 뉴욕 토큰
coin_new_yorke_token_3.desc: In the middle of the ruined house.
coin_five_dollar_bechtler.name: 1800년 5달러 베츨러
coin_five_dollar_bechtler_1.desc: At trunk of dead tree. Beside two fallen tree trunks.
coin_quarter.name: 1792년 쿼터
coin_quarter_1.desc: At the trunk of the tree.
coin_quarter_2.desc: At the foot of the northen dead tree.
coin_gold_dollar_coin.name: 1800년 골드 달러
coin_gold_dollar_coin_1.desc: At the base of the dead tree.
coin_gold_dollar_coin_2.desc: Inside the cave underneath the hanging lantern.
coin_gold_dollar_coin_3.desc: In between a big and small rock.
coin_nickel_coin.name: 1792년 니켈
coin_nickel_coin_2.desc: In the hay shack next to the hay bales.
coin_nickel_coin_3.desc: Within the circle of burned down trees.
coin_halfpenny.name: 1796년 하프페니
coin_halfpenny_2.desc: Behind the cabin between a rock and a tree.
coin_half_eagle.name: 1795년 하프 이글
coin_half_eagle_1.desc: On a ledge almost at the top of the cliff.
coin_gold_eagle.name: 1797년 골드 이글
coin_gold_eagle_3.desc: West side of the large rock.
coin_liberty_quarter.name: 1792년 리버티 쿼터
coin_liberty_quarter_1.desc: At the dead end of the path next to a broken bridge.
coin_liberty_quarter_2.desc: In front of a large rock.
coin_half_dime.name: 1800년 하프 다임
coin_half_dime_1.desc: On the bank of the river next to some lavender plants.
coin_half_dime_2.desc: Underneath the railway bridge in a small ditch. (not the large one)
coin_penny.name: 1789년 페니
coin_penny_1.desc: Next to a tree in the middle of the peninsula.
coin_penny_2.desc: On the right side of the dead tree.
coin_penny_3.desc: Next to a broken down wagon.
bottle_tennesee_whiskey.name: 테네시 위스키
bottle_tennesee_whiskey_2.desc: Inside building in cabinet in far right corner.
bottle_tennesee_whiskey_3.desc: In a cabinet in the livingroom.
bottle_irish_whiskey.name: 아이리시 위스키
bottle_irish_whiskey_1.desc: It's up. Climb ladder, hop rail, walk over, hop another rail, walk around corner. At last door.
bottle_scotch_whisky.name: 스카치 위스키
bottle_scotch_whisky_1.desc: On the table on the right as soon as you walk in the shack.
bottle_absinthe.name: 압생트
bottle_absinthe_2.desc: In mausoleum. Enterance only from the west.
bottle_gran_corazon_madeira.name: 그랜 코라손 마데이라
bottle_gran_corazon_madeira_1.desc: On a crate infront of the butchers tent.
bottle_gran_corazon_madeira_2.desc: At the back of the broken down wagon.
bottle_gran_corazon_madeira_3.desc: In the green cabinet in the corner.
bottle_old_tom_gin.name: 올드 톰 진
bottle_old_tom_gin_1.desc: West side of the house in the broken porch.
bottle_caribbean_rum.name: 캐리비안 럼
bottle_caribbean_rum_1.desc: In a cabinet next the door.
bottle_caribbean_rum_3.desc: On top of the table as you walk in.
bottle_cognac_bottle.name: 코냑
bottle_cognac_bottle_1.desc: In cabinet on the right as soon as you jump through the window. Jump on wagon then roof of deck to get to second floor window.
bottle_cognac_bottle_2.desc: In a turned over metal barrel.
bottle_london_dry_gin.name: 런던 드라이 진
arrowhead_rough.name: 거친 화살촉
arrowhead_rough_1.desc: Next to some rocks under a tree.
arrowhead_rough_2.desc: On the west side of a large rock.
arrowhead_splintered.name: 조각난 화살촉
arrowhead_splintered_3.desc: In front of the dead tree stump next to the house.
arrowhead_crude.name: 투박한 화살촉
arrowhead_crude_2.desc: Between a fence and a broken down wagon next to the barn.
arrowhead_crude_3.desc: In front of the tipi tent.
arrowhead_chipped.name: 깨진 화살촉
arrowhead_chipped_3.desc: In the center of a half-circle of rocks. Beware of cougars.
arrowhead_feldspar.name: 장석  화살촉
arrowhead_feldspar_1.desc: In the middle of the "ring" of rocks.
arrowhead_feldspar_2.desc: At the base of a tree atop the hill.
arrowhead_slate.name: 점판암 화살촉
arrowhead_slate_2.desc: Inside the cave, entrance just below the "U" in "Mount Shann".
arrowhead_slate_3.desc: On the southside of the cotton field.
arrowhead_bone.name: 뼈 화살촉
arrowhead_bone_2.desc: On the middle of the island in a clearing.
arrowhead_raw.name: 미가공 화살촉
arrowhead_raw_1.desc: Under the tree with the dreamcatchers.
arrowhead_raw_3.desc: In front of a tree on the shoreline of a small stream.
arrowhead_obsidian.name: 흑요석 화살촉
arrowhead_obsidian_1.desc: In the middle of the chalk drawing.
arrowhead_obsidian_2.desc: Next to the scarecrow in the wheat field.
arrowhead_obsidian_3.desc: In the middle of the stone circle.
arrowhead_quartz.name: 석영 화살촉
arrowhead_quartz_2.desc: Between the larger tree and the rock.
arrowhead_flint.name: 부싯돌 화살촉
arrowhead_flint_1.desc: In the middle of Fort Brennand.
arrowhead_flint_2.desc: In an alcove halfway up the side of the mountain.
arrowhead_agate.name: 마노 화살촉
arrowhead_agate_2.desc: Inbetween a wagon wheel and part of a tree trunk.
heirlooms_jade_hairpin.name: 비취 머리핀
heirlooms_jade_hairpin_1.desc: On the red bench behind the house.
heirlooms_jade_hairpin_3.desc: In the middle of the wagon circle.
heirlooms_cherrywood_comb.name: 벚나무 빗
heirlooms_cherrywood_comb_1.desc: In backroom of main floor of house inside chest.
heirlooms_cherrywood_comb_2.desc: Upstairs in Saloon, east room. On top of wash stand.
heirlooms_cherrywood_comb_3.desc: Upstairs in the northeast room in a chest at the foot of the bed.
heirlooms_ebony_hairbrush.name: 에보니 머리빗
heirlooms_ebony_hairbrush_1.desc: On a window sill southside of the house.
heirlooms_ebony_hairbrush_2.desc: On a couch on the deck at the west side of the house.
heirlooms_metal_hairpin.name: 금속 머리핀
heirlooms_metal_hairpin_2.desc: On the side of the barn near some stacked crates.
heirlooms_metal_hairpin_3.desc: In front of the burned down house.
heirlooms_carved_wooden.name: 조각된 나무 머리핀
heirlooms_carved_wooden_2.desc: In front of the "Keep Out" sign.
heirlooms_boxwood_comb.name: 회양목 빗
heirlooms_boxwood_comb_1.desc: Inside in a chest at the foot end of a bed.
heirlooms_boxwood_comb_2.desc: Inside the house in the tall wardrobe.
heirlooms_boxwood_comb_3.desc: Upstairs on the dresser in room 2B.
heirlooms_goat_hair_brush.name: 염소 털 브러시
heirlooms_goat_hair_brush_1.desc: Upstairs on top of the fireplace.
heirlooms_goat_hair_brush_2.desc: On a dresser in bedroom 1 upstairs
heirlooms_goat_hair_brush_3.desc: In a chest on the lower deck of the ship.
heirlooms_ebony_hairpin.name: 에보니 머리핀
heirlooms_ebony_hairpin_3.desc: On a three seater bench inside and to the right.
heirlooms_ivory_hairpin.name: 상아 머리핀
heirlooms_ivory_hairpin_1.desc: On a white table with a chess board.
heirlooms_ivory_hairpin_3.desc: In the backyard next to the shed.
heirlooms_rosewood_hairbrush.name: 자단나무 머리빗
heirlooms_rosewood_hairbrush_1.desc: Inside a chest in the first room.
heirlooms_rosewood_hairbrush_2.desc: On the nightstand in the corner.
heirlooms_rosewood_hairbrush_3.desc: Inside house in large wardrobe in the bedroom.
heirlooms_tortoiseshell_comb.name: 거북딱지 빗
heirlooms_tortoiseshell_comb_2.desc: In the house on the dresser with a mirror.
heirlooms_tortoiseshell_comb_3.desc: In the house on the wash table.
heirlooms_ivory_comb.name: 상아 빗
heirlooms_ivory_comb_1.desc: Beside the sink inside the boat.
heirlooms_ivory_comb_2.desc: On a sidetable near the couches on the top floor of the saloon.
heirlooms_ivory_comb_3.desc: Inside on the table in the back.
heirlooms_horse_hair_brush.name: 말 털 브러시
heirlooms_horse_hair_brush_1.desc: On a table on the deck.
heirlooms_horse_hair_brush_2.desc: In corner table of room upstairs in Saloon.
heirlooms_horse_hair_brush_3.desc: In the green cabinet next to the fireplace.
heirlooms_boar_bristle_brush.name: 멧돼지 털 브러시
heirlooms_boar_bristle_brush_2.desc: In the chair on the front porch.
heirlooms_boar_bristle_brush_3.desc: Inside chest left of house entrance.
heirlooms_new_guinea_rosewood.name: 뉴기니 자단나무 머리빗
heirlooms_new_guinea_rosewood_1.desc: On a chair in the room on the main floor.
heirlooms_new_guinea_rosewood_2.desc: In room 1B in the back on the ground floor on the dresser with the mirror.
heirlooms_new_guinea_rosewood_3.desc: On the back porch of the mansion on the table.
ring_harland_coral.name: 할랜드 코랄 반지
ring_harland_coral_2.desc: In a lockbox in the frozen waterfall.
ring_harland_coral_3.desc: At the foot of the dead tree.
ring_magnate_turquoise.name: 거물 터키석 반지
ring_magnate_turquoise_2.desc: At the foot of a small tree.
ring_magnate_turquoise_3.desc: In a lockbox on the edge of the rocks.
ring_pilgrim_moonstone.name: 필그림 문스톤 반지
ring_pilgrim_moonstone_2.desc: Inside the house, climb the tree to get in. Watchout pack of wolves.
ring_pilgrim_moonstone_3.desc: In the crater next to the central meteorite.
ring_bonnard_pearl.name: 보나르 진주 반지
ring_bonnard_pearl_3.desc: In a lockbox behind the waterfall.
ring_banais_topaz.name: 바나이즈 토파즈 반지
ring_banais_topaz_3.desc: Inside a birdsnest next to the bell.
ring_beaulieux_diamond.name: 보리우 다이아몬드 반지
ring_beaulieux_diamond_2.desc: In a lockbox a little bit below the bridge.
ring_beaulieux_diamond_3.desc: Inside a chimney. Watch for cougars.
ring_yates_diamond.name: 예이츠 다이아몬드 반지
ring_yates_diamond_2.desc: Upstairs in a lockbox next to the beds.
ring_aubrey_onyx.name: 오브리 오닉스 반지
ring_aubrey_onyx_2.desc: On the side of the cliff near the wallpainting.
ring_bosque_emerald.name: 보스케 에메랄드 반지
ring_bosque_emerald_1.desc: Between the bushes in a small clearing.
ring_bosque_emerald_2.desc: Next to a rock with a chalk drawing on it.
ring_bosque_emerald_3.desc: Next to trhee trees behind a grave.
ring_sackville_diamond.name: 색빌 다이아몬드 반지
ring_sackville_diamond_1.desc: In front of a dead tree.
ring_thorburn_turquoise.name: 소어번 터키석 반지
ring_thorburn_turquoise_3.desc: Inside the house in the chimney.
necklace_blakely_miniatue.name: 블레이클리 미니어쳐 목걸이
necklace_blakely_miniatue_1.desc: In a chest on a ridge next to a rotting elk.
necklace_blakely_miniatue_3.desc: Between a tree and a fallen tree.
necklace_richelieu_amethyst.name: 리슐리외 자수정 목걸이
necklace_richelieu_amethyst_1.desc: In a lockbox in the worn down shack.
necklace_richelieu_amethyst_2.desc: Inside the log cabin in a lockbox next to the sink.
necklace_richelieu_amethyst_3.desc: In a lockbox in the shed.
necklace_pelle_pearl.name: 펠레 진주 목걸이
necklace_pelle_pearl_1.desc: At the very top of the plateau near the edge.
necklace_pelle_pearl_2.desc: In front of a tree surrounded by shrubbery.
necklace_ainsworth_cross.name: 에인스워스 십자가 목걸이
necklace_ainsworth_cross_1.desc: On table inside tiny church building. Crouch to get in.
necklace_ainsworth_cross_2.desc: Besides the lone tree with the dreamcatchers.
necklace_ainsworth_cross_3.desc: On a search spot in the middle of a log brige.
necklace_braxton_amethyst.name: 브랙스턴 자수정 목걸이
necklace_braxton_amethyst_1.desc: On a ledge in a lockbox below a rock next to an elk skeleton.
necklace_braxton_amethyst_2.desc: In a lockbox halfway up the cliff.
necklace_braxton_amethyst_3.desc: In a chest under a rock with an animal carcass on top
necklace_rou_pearl.name: 로우 진주 목걸이
necklace_rou_pearl_2.desc: On the island between some rocks.
necklace_rou_pearl_3.desc: Inside the cave in the center of the circle of statues.
necklace_gosselin_white_gold.name: 고셀린 화이트 골드 목걸이
necklace_gosselin_white_gold_1.desc: At the tip of the island near a bunch of rocks.
necklace_gosselin_white_gold_2.desc: In a large chest near other luggage.
necklace_gosselin_white_gold_3.desc: In the tree on the cliff edge.
necklace_dane_topaz.name: 데인 토파즈 목걸이
necklace_dane_topaz_2.desc: Between the alcove and some shrubbery.
necklace_tuamotu_pearl.name: 투아모투 진주 목걸이
necklace_tuamotu_pearl_1.desc: Almost at the end of the peninsula.
necklace_tuamotu_pearl_2.desc: On a small plateu besides a rock.
necklace_tuamotu_pearl_3.desc: Inside lockbox on top of rocks.
earring_ursula_citrine.name: 우슬라 시트린 귀걸이
earring_ursula_citrine_1.desc: In the clearing between a bunch of rocks.
earring_royal_victoria.name: 왕실 빅토리아 다이아몬드 귀걸이
earring_royal_victoria_1.desc: Next to a tree atop the plateau.
earring_royal_victoria_2.desc: On the west side of the larger rock.
earring_royal_victoria_3.desc: In front of the two boulders.
earring_calumet_turquoise.name: 칼루멧 터키석 귀걸이
earring_calumet_turquoise_1.desc: On shore near washed up tree trunk.
earring_calumet_turquoise_2.desc: On the right side of "Dorothy Hewitt's" grave.
earring_calumet_turquoise_3.desc: Below the window underneath the house next to a barrel with a red lid.
earring_orchidee_diamond.name: 오키드 다이아몬드 귀걸이
earring_orchidee_diamond_1.desc: Underneath the bridge besides the support pillar.
earring_sterling_tooth.name: 스털링 이빨 귀걸이
earring_sterling_tooth_2.desc: Between the fallen tree and log.
earring_sterling_tooth_3.desc: By the treetrunk on the cliff edge.
earring_harford_garnet.name: 하포드 가넷 귀걸이
earring_harford_garnet_1.desc: On the west side of the large rock.
earring_harford_garnet_2.desc: Between the tree and large rock.
earring_harford_garnet_3.desc: In a chest in the red wagon.
earring_duchess_emerald.name: 공작부인 에메랄드 귀걸이
earring_duchess_emerald_1.desc: In the center clearing of the intersection next to the tree with the signs.
earring_duchess_emerald_2.desc: Inside a lockbox in the alcove.
earring_duchess_emerald_3.desc: Next to a couple rocks and a small tree. Easy to spot.
earring_beauchene_ruby.name: 보쉥 루비 귀걸이
earring_beauchene_ruby_1.desc: In between the rocks in the corner of the ditch.
earring_beauchene_ruby_2.desc: Halfway up the cliffside. Between two trees.
earring_beauchene_ruby_3.desc: On the west side of the island near a bush.
earring_endicott_diamond.name: 엔디콧 다이아몬드 귀걸이
earring_endicott_diamond_1.desc: Atop the ledge, next to two trees.
earring_endicott_diamond_2.desc: in front of the southern "John Doe" grave.
earring_josephine_pearl.name: 조세핀 진주 귀걸이
earring_josephine_pearl_1.desc: Inside the cave. Entrance: above 'A' of Annesburg.
earring_emmeline_coral.name: 에멜라인 코랄 귀걸이
earring_emmeline_coral_3.desc: Next to the railroad at the start of the small bridge.
bracelet_greco_sapphire.name: 그레코 사파이어 팔찌
bracelet_abello_ruby_bangle.name: 아벨로 루비 뱅글 팔찌
bracelet_abello_ruby_bangle_2.desc: Between the two trees on the island.
bracelet_abello_ruby_bangle_3.desc: Inside a chest hidden beneath a bunch of dead trees.
bracelet_ojeda_rose_gold.name: 오헤다 로즈 골드 뱅글 팔찌
bracelet_ojeda_rose_gold_1.desc: In a lockbox under a rock atop the plateau.
bracelet_helena_sapphire.name: 헬레나 사파이어 팔찌
bracelet_helena_sapphire_1.desc: In a lockbox left of the railroad at the entrance of the tunnel. Climb up the hill from the dotted path to the south and walk east on the railroad.
bracelet_helena_sapphire_2.desc: In a chest behind the waterfall.
bracelet_helena_sapphire_3.desc: In a lockbox next to the large rock.
bracelet_durant_pearl.name: 듀런트 진주 팔찌
bracelet_durant_pearl_1.desc: In a lockbox below a log next to a cliff face.
bracelet_durant_pearl_3.desc: On the small island in a large chest.
bracelet_infanta_turquoise.name: 인팬타 터키석 팔찌
bracelet_infanta_turquoise_1.desc: In a chest, on the big central rock just on top of the waterfall!
bracelet_infanta_turquoise_2.desc: Near the rock on the left side of the tunnel entrance.
bracelet_elliston_carved.name: 조각된 엘리스톤 팔찌
bracelet_elliston_carved_3.desc: West side of the church near the entrance of the graveyard.
bracelet_hajnal_garnet_bangle.name: 하이날 가닛 뱅글 팔찌
bracelet_hajnal_garnet_bangle_1.desc: In a chest on a ridge.
bracelet_hajnal_garnet_bangle_2.desc: In chest at the base of the tree
bracelet_hajnal_garnet_bangle_3.desc: In a lockbox underneath the bridge.

egg_eagle.name: 독수리 알
egg_egret.name: 백로 알
egg_goose.name: 거위 알
egg_hawk.name: 매 알
egg_heron.name: 왜가리 알
egg_loon.name: 아비새 알
egg_spoonbill.name: 저어새 알
egg_vulture.name: 벌처 알
flower_agarita.name: 아가리타
flower_bitterweed.name: 비터위드
flower_blood_flower.name: 블러드 플라워
flower_cardinal.name: 진홍 로벨리아
flower_chocolate_daisy.name: 초콜릿 데이지
flower_creek_plum.name: 크릭 플럼
flower_texas_bluebonnet.name: 텍사스 블루보넷
flower_wild_rhubarb.name: 야생 대황
flower_wisteria.name: 등나무
random_item.name: 랜덤 아이템
